lexUnit.name: glen.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a narrow valley, especially in Scotland or Ireland.

sentence.text: The men wore short kilts of grey homespun , their hair was flowing or knotted at the back , most were bearded : the uplanders had arrived from the Glen of Keltney .
